channel.title: Wtf offline? REP++++++ FOR HELP!
channel.description:
Okay so I was running my server yesterday and have been for awhile. I have about 35 people that play my 525, and when I got home when day, I had recieved about 20 messages on msn asking why the server was down.
So out of no where my server shut off and won't connect anymore. Everything is the same but still no connection.
After that I restored my routers factory defaults, Re-Portforwarded, And reset my environmental variables. I checked my no-ip but everything is fine there. And now, no matter what I do or have tried, My server will NOT CONNECT! it's offline and I can't figure out why. Help is REP+++

item.title: Wtf offline? REP++++++ FOR HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

should’ve done what buut said… save money and time, next time just look into ipconfig… sometimes my router tends to change the last digit (192.168.2.1-5)

Read full topic

item.description:
@buut15 wrote:

e bunny:

I fixed myself. I just bought a new router.

Wow… You are very dedicated. lol

item.title: Wtf offline? REP++++++ FOR HELP!
item.dc:creator: @buut15 buut15
item.description:
@buut15 wrote:

[quote=“e bunny, post:8, topic:350864”]Dude I’ve literally done all of that. I even restored my system from last week.

I’ve tried everything I can possibly think of. I Closed my no-ip account and made a new one, activated redownloaded no-ip. changed my ip’s reportforwarded again! I’ve done fucking everything And i’m getting really fucking pissed![/quote]
Go to command prompt and do “ipconfig”.
Copy your “IPv4 Address”.
Go into your router and change the ip. This is what I always do to fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf offline? REP++++++ FOR HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Trxkin Trxkin
item.description:
@Trxkin wrote:

I don't use uTorrent... I portforwarded directly with my router.

Ok, then try to restart your whole computer. Then only open up No-Ip and ur source. Make sure No-Ip is up and working, then run server and see if that works.

Insert Quote Okay so I was running my server yesterday and have been for awhile. I have about 35 people that play my 525, and when I got home when day, I had recieved about 20 messages on msn asking why the server was down.

So out of no where my server shut off and won’t connect anymore. Everything is the same but still no connection.

After that I restored my routers factory defaults, Re-Portforwarded, And reset my environmental variables.
I checked my no-ip but everything is fine there.
And now, no matter what I do or have tried, My server will NOT CONNECT! it’s offline and I can’t figure out why. Help is REP+++

Make sure everything is closed when you run server. Then run, run.java. After you run that. Run uTorrent.
